description: The National Research Council Canada is looking for a forklift and ancillary items including training from holders of Supply Agreement # E60HS-21FRKL/A. The deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2024. NRC has adopted the Integrity Regime and I procedures are being applied in NRC contracting activities. The tenders must be submitted to the NRC Bid Receiving Unit. Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents can be submitted in English or French inquiry documents only. The minimum procurement value is $250,000. The proposed contract is a Goods contract. The Status of the procurement is Expired. Procurement Category is Goods. The Tender Closing Date is February 22, 2024, 2:00pm EST. The Expected Contract Start Date is February 29, 2024, and the End Date is March 31, 2024. The GFREIN is N90GR from the contract number 23-58222

full_summary:
### Tender Notice

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

* **Reference Number:** cb-100-90016332
* **Solicitation Number:** 23-58222
* **Publication Date:** February 7, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** February 22, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

### Tender Overview

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking a single forklift and ancillary items, including training, as outlined in Solicitation Number 23-58222. The solicitation document is available for download at the link below:

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31477/23-58222_npp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31477/23-58222_npp_en.pdf) (English)
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31477/23-58222_npp_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31477/23-58222_npp_fr.pdf) (French)

### Key Details

* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity:** Canada (NCR)
* **Region of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 29, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024
* **Tender Procedure:** Selective Tendering

### Important Notes

* Tenders must be submitted electronically to the NRC Bid Receiving Unit at [NRC.BidReceiving-ReceptiondesSoumissions.CNRC@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:NRC.BidReceiving-ReceptiondesSoumissions.CNRC@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca).
* The lowest valid bid will be awarded the contract.
* Submissions must be made in either English or French.
* The NRC reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

### Contact Information

* **Procuring Office:** Tania Backes
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Email: [Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
